# Saban Films Takes U.S. For Houston Bone’s Horror ‘Son of Sara: Volume 1’

EXCLUSIVE: Saban Films has acquired U.S. rights for Canadian director Houston Bone’s horror Son of Sara: Volume 1 about a troubled pregnant woman who accepts an invite to a dinner party which degenerates into a bloody and demented nightmare.

New York-based Visit Films sealed the deal and will be continuing sales on the title at European Film Market next month. [...] Chloe Van Landschoot (Lune, From) stars alongside Tymika Tafari (Settle Down), Garrett Hnatiuk (Father’s Day), and Jane Moffat (Fahrenheit 451).

[News  

### Heist-Thriller 'The Smack', With Casey Affleck, Sam Rockwell, Kathy Bates & Marisa Tomei, Heads To EFM With Concourse](

The picture opened the Blood in the Snow Festival in Toronto in November 2025, where Van Landschoot won the festival’s award for Best Lead Performance in a Feature Film.

data.title: Berlinale Juries: ‘Rental Family’ Director Hikari; Producers Ewa Puszczyńska & Reinaldo Marcus Green Join Wim Wenders On Competition Jury - Deadline
data.snippet:
They are director and producer Min Bahadur Bham (Nepal), actor Bae Doona (South Korea), director, producer and archivist Shivendra Singh Dungarpur (India), director, screenwriter and producer Reinaldo Marcus Green (USA), director, screenwriter and producer HIKARI (Japan) and producer Ewa Puszczyńska (Poland).

The competition jury will decide the winners of Golden Bear for Best Film (awarded to the film’s producers) as well as Silver Bears for the Grand Jury Prize, Jury Prize, Best Director, Best Leading Performance, Best Supporting Performance, Best Screenplay and Outstanding Artistic Contribution.

# Berlinale Juries: ‘Rental Family’ Director Hikari; Producers Ewa Puszczyńska & Reinaldo Marcus Green Join Wim Wenders On Competition Jury

The Berlin Film Festival has unveiled the members of the jury who will join its president Wim Wenders in deciding which of the 22 films in Competition at this year’s edition will take home the Golden and Silver Bears.

data.title: ‘John Proctor Is The Villain’ Movie At Universal Taps Danya Taymor To Direct - Deadline
data.snippet:
Kimberly Belflower, writer of the original play, will script the adaptation. Tina Fey and Eric Gurian will produce through their Universal-based Little Stranger, Inc. Marc Platt, Adam Siegel and Jared LeBoff will produce through their Universal-based Marc Platt Productions. Sadie Sink, who starred in the original and earned a Tony nomination for her performance, will executive produce.

Read the full story

# ‘John Proctor Is The Villain’ Movie At Universal Taps Danya Taymor To Direct [...] John Proctor is the Villain has garnered 7 Tony Award nominations, including Best Play, and has grossed over $17 million and had an attendance of over 150,000 people over the course of its Broadway run. The play had a school licensing campaign of roughly 100 productions. The play, which completed its thrice-extended Broadway run at the Booth Theatre September 7, 2025, will play London’s Royal Court Theatre March 20 through April 25, 2026.

### Watch on Deadline

Universal has seen strong results for its Broadway adaptations as of late, most recently adapting Wicked into a two-part blockbuster hit with the first film earning an Oscar nomination for best picture. Senior Vice President of Production Development and Special Projects Britt Hennemuth will oversee the project for the Studio.

# Lionsgate’s ‘John Rambo’ Adds Five To Cast; Starts Production

Lionsgate’s origin story John Rambo has begun production in Bangkok, Thailand, adding five more to the cast led by Noah Centineo.

Rounding out the ensemble are yao (Sinners), Jason Tobin (A Thousand Blows), Quincy Isaiah (Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty), Jefferson White (Yellowstone), and Tayme Thapthimthong (The White Lotus).

### Related Stories

[News [...] ### Related Stories

[News  

### AGBO Boards Lionsgate & Millennium Media’s ‘John Rambo’](

[Acquisitions  

### Netflix Eyeing Legendary’s Live-Action ‘Gundam’ Movie Starring Sydney Sweeney & Noah Centineo](

John Rambo takes audiences back, years before the events of First Blood, diving deep into the roots and experiences that forged one of the big screen’s most enduring and complex characters.

Thapthmthong portrayed Gaitok the security guard in Season 3 of The White Lotus. Isaiah was Magic Johnson in Winning Time. Jefferson White, who portrayed Jimmy Hurdstrom in Yellowstone, will also appear in The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping this fall. yao starred in Ryan Coogler’s Sinners as Bo Chow.
